text: Auto Brothers is a 1999 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Nissar, starring Jagadish, Harisree Ashokan and Chandni in the lead role. ==Cast== * Jagadish as Babu * Anitha Nair as Radha * Harisree Ashokan as Pappan/Padmanabhan * Baiju (actor) as Krishanan * Cochin Haneefa as Aliannan * Chandni Shaju as Sudha * Machan Varghese as Abootty * Mahesh * Baiju Ezhupunna * Salim Kumar * Idavela Babu * Indrans as Induchoodan * Mamukkoya as Saithikka * A. C. Zainuddin as Aana Alex * Kalabhavan Navas as Raaju * Shammi Thilakan as Nazeer Saith * Madhupal as Bipin Chandran/Chandran saab * Bechoor Rehman as Kevin Fenadaz ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Auto Brothers
